H0.text: Name the smartphone app devised by a London teenager bought by Yahoo for reportedly £18m in 2013. Newsbite

H1.text: Name the smartphone app devised by a London teenager bought by Yahoo for reportedly £18m in 2013. TeenFeed

H2.text: Name the smartphone app devised by a London teenager bought by Yahoo for reportedly £18m in 2013. Buzzwire

H3.text: Name the smartphone app devised by a London teenager bought by Yahoo for reportedly £18m in 2013. Summly

A4.text: Summly is a mobile app which automatically summarises news articles and other material.

A5.text: Summly was sold to Yahoo! for approximately US$30 million in March 2013.

A6.text: D'Aloisio re-designed the app and renamed it Summly in December 2011.
